nodes.explanation: words related to reading activities and sources of information
phrases indicating that the reader is currently reading something
references to reading or consuming content
phrases indicating continuation or additional information
phrases indicating a call to action or a request to read something
references to reading text or books
references to reading activities or written materials
mentions of reading something closely or carefully
key words in documentation structure, like "READ ME" files or code comments, that provide guidance or background information
specific instances of the word "this" followed by another word or phrase
